sqlMap.statement: SELECT TAB.BIZ_APP_ID AS BIZ_APP_ID ,PRC.OTH_SYS_URL AS OTH_SYS_URL FROM MENU_PROC PRC ,UP_TAB_RELN REL ,UP_TAB TAB WHERE PRC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND PRC.MENU_PROC_ID = #MENU_PROC_ID# AND PRC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND REL.GLBL_CMPY_CD_P0 = PRC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND REL.MENU_PROC_ID = PRC.MENU_PROC_ID AND REL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND TAB.GLBL_CMPY_CD = REL.GLBL_CMPY_CD_T0 AND TAB.UP_TAB_CD = REL.UP_TAB_CD AND TAB.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY PRC.MENU_PROC_ID ,TAB.UP_TAB_OP_SORT_NUM
